nodes.text: Calladan's field was a place on the planet Gorse that was near the settlement of Gorse City. During the Gorse conflict, the Galactic Empire rerouted all of Moonglow Polychemical's personnel transports to Calladan's field. This created a traffic jam for the returning miners and Okadiah Garson was forced to take a hovercab back to his cantina The Asteroid Belt.
